New Records: Virat Kohli equalled Rohit Sharma's record for the most number of fifty-plus scores in T20I cricket with 31 fifties
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli hit a 44-ball 59 not out
Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav stitched a 98-run stand in just 7 overs
Suryakumar Yadav went berserk for a 26-ball 68
India posted 192 for 2 vs Hong Kong in Dubai
Miscellaneous Highlights: India finished with 192 for 2 at the end of 20 overs against Hong Kong
Virat Kohli ended a 6-month-long wait for a fifty in T20I cricket
Others: The star batter showed signs of a return to form
Kohli followed up the solid 35 that he had scored against Pakistan to finish with 59 not out against Hong Kong
